full_text: RT @100trillionUSD: Facts: "Identified cases of laundering through cryptocurrencies remain relatively small compared to the volumes of cash…

localize.full_text: RT @100trillionUSD: 事实： "已查明的通过加密货币洗钱的案件与现金数量相比仍然相对较小... ...
localize.retweeted_status_full_text:
事实。"与通过传统方法清洗现金的数量相比，已查明的通过加密货币进行清洗的案件仍然相对较少"。- SWIFT &amp；BAE研究报告
https://t.co/HhXKxpP5Fd

localize.full_text: RT @100trillionUSD: 事實： "已查明的通過加密貨幣洗錢的案件與現金數量相比仍然相對較小... ...
localize.retweeted_status_full_text:
事實。"與通過傳統方法清洗現金的數量相比，已查明的通過加密貨幣進行清洗的案件仍然相對較少"。- SWIFT &amp；BAE研究報告
https://t.co/HhXKxpP5Fd

retweeted_status.full_text:
Facts: "Identified cases of laundering through cryptocurrencies remain relatively small compared to the volumes of cash laundered through traditional methods." - SWIFT & BAE Research Report
